WRITING.TITLE: My daughter came home today and said "Dad, I'd like you to meet my new boyfriend Mike."
WRITING.TEXT:
"Are you kidding me?!" I said, "What the fuck are you doing with this ugly loser? Don't scrape the barrel, you can do much better than this."
"Dad!!" my daughter screamed, "Mike is lovely!"
"I know." I replied "I was talking to him."

WRITING.TITLE: It's my son's 18th birthday today
WRITING.TEXT:
"All these presents are just for you!" I said
After ripping them open excitedly, he said "Dad, all these boxes are empty..."
"I know. Use them to pack your things and get the fuck out."
He's gonna have a chip on his shoulder when he wakes up.
Hopefully not almond! I once saw a friend almost die from ~~a nut allergy~~ an almond milk overdose.

Jesus, does he not know yoghurts are a gateway to harder dairy products?! He'll be a milk drinker soon, starting at skimmed which will inevitably lead to him trying full fat. Then the real problems start, he'll start drinking straight from the carton and eating blocks of cheese.

I've always worked on the premise that if it sounds like it starts with a vowel it's 'an' and if it sounds like it starts with a consonant it's 'a'.
L is pronounced 'el' so it would be "add an L".

Spain have always been opposed to an independent Scotland. However, by saying they will not veto Scotland's independent EU membership request, it appears they might have softened their stance somewhat. This is good news for Nicola Sturgeon, although I seriously doubt any of it will come to fruition.

I think the ISS uses (UTC) which is the same as (GMT) so they'll have the same timezone as London.
Makes you wonder though, the astronauts would be acclimatised to Kazakhstan time so why not have the same timezone on the ISS?
